languages.text: "Шрамы на вашей душе кровоточат пепельно-синим. Но сердце полнится всполохами невероятных красок — кристально-чистые цвета, без примесей и грязных оттенков. Чистое сердце... я почти забыла, что такие бывают".

"The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen azure. Yet your heart is bursting with flares of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any additions or impurities. A pure heart... I had all but forgotten they existed."
languages.original_text: "Шрамы на вашей душе кровоточат пепельно-синим. Но сердце полнится всполохами невероятных красок — кристально-чистые цвета, без примесей и грязных оттенков. Чистое сердце... я почти забыла, что такие бывают".

traits.locale_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen blue. Yet your heart is full of flashes of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any admixtures or impurities. A pure heart... I have all but forgotten they exist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen blue. Yet your heart is full of flashes of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any admixtures or impurities. A pure heart... I have all but forgotten they exist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen azul. Yet your heart is bursting with flares of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any tinctures or impurities. A pure heart... I have all but forgotten they exist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen azure. Yet your heart is bursting with flares of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any additions or impurities. A pure heart... I had all but forgotten they existed."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen azure. Yet your heart is bursting with flares of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any additions or impurities. A pure heart... I had all but forgotten they existed."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Las cicatrices de tu alma arden con un azur cinéreo. Sin embargo, tu corazón destella con brillos de los tonos más increíbles: colores cristalinos sin añadidos ni impurezas. Un corazón puro... Casi había olvidado que existen».
languages.original_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen azure. Yet your heart is bursting with flares of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any additions or impurities. A pure heart... I had all but forgotten they existed."

traits.locale_text: «Las cicatrices de tu alma arden con un azur cinéreo. Sin embargo, tu corazón destella con brillos de los tonos más increíbles: colores cristalinos sin tonalidades ni impurezas. Un corazón puro... Casi había olvidado que existen».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Du sang d'un bleu cendré s'écoule des cicatrices qui marquent votre âme. Pourtant, des lueurs aux incroyables nuances jaillissent de votre cœur... Des couleurs cristallines, sans la moindre impureté. Un cœur pur... J'avais presque oublié que cela existait. »
languages.original_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen azure. Yet your heart is bursting with flares of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any additions or impurities. A pure heart... I had all but forgotten they existed."

traits.locale_text: « Du sang d'un bleu cendré s'écoule des cicatrices qui marquent votre âme. Pourtant, des lueurs aux incroyables nuances jaillissent de votre cœur... Des couleurs cristallines, sans la moindre impureté. Un cœur pur... J'avais presque oublié que cela existait. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの魂の傷から流れるのは蒼白い血。ですが、あなたの心は最も驚くべき色…一辺の濁りもない水晶のように澄み切った色で燃え盛っています。純粋な心…ほとんど存在すら忘れかけていました」
languages.original_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen azure. Yet your heart is bursting with flares of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any additions or impurities. A pure heart... I had all but forgotten they existed."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの魂の傷から流れるのは蒼白い血。ですが、あなたの心は最も驚くべき色…一辺の濁りもない水晶のように澄み切った色で燃え盛っています。純粋な心…ほとんど存在すら忘れかけていました」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你灵魂上的伤痕流淌着灰暗的血迹，可你的心却迸发着最不可思议的色泽——晶莹剔透，没有一丝杂质。如此纯净的心灵……我都快忘记了还有这样的东西存在。”
languages.original_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen azure. Yet your heart is bursting with flares of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any additions or impurities. A pure heart... I had all but forgotten they existed."

traits.locale_text: “你灵魂上的伤痕流淌着灰暗的血迹，可你的心却迸发着最不可思议的色泽——晶莹剔透，没有一丝杂质。如此纯净的心灵……我都快忘记还有这样的东西了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Wunden auf Eurer Seele bluten in aschenem Azur. Doch aus Eurem Herzen schießen Flammen in den unglaublichsten Tönen — kristallklare Farben ohne Ergänzungen oder Unreinheiten. Ein reines Herz ... Ich hatte schon fast vergessen, dass sie existieren."
languages.original_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen azure. Yet your heart is bursting with flares of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any additions or impurities. A pure heart... I had all but forgotten they existed."

traits.locale_text: "Die Wunden auf Eurer Seele bluten in aschenem Azulblau. Doch aus Eurem Herzen schießen Flammen in den unglaublichsten Tönen — kristallklare Farben ohne Tinkturen oder Unreinheiten. Ein reines Herz ... Ich habe schon fast vergessen, dass sie existieren."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ruhundaki yaralar, küle çalmış bir gök mavisiyle kanıyor. Kalbinse en harika tonlarla parlıyor, hiçbir leke veya fazlalığı olmayan cam gibi parlak renklere sahip. Saf bir kalp... Hâlâ var olduklarını unutmuştum."
languages.original_text: "The scars upon your soul bleed an ashen azure. Yet your heart is bursting with flares of the most incredible hues — crystal-clear colours without any additions or impurities. A pure heart... I had all but forgotten they existed."
